segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the chaos around her, she's so focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and water is pouring onto the floor, it's getting everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, taking cookies while she's distracted, they're so clever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on a stool, and it looks like it's about to tip over, that's not safe at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, that would be terrible, I can't watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely trusting her brother, she's so sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the water yet, she's going to slip and fall, someone should warn her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and tidy, unlike the kitchen, it's a nice view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the water before it's too late, someone should tell her, she's so distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really determined to get those cookies, he must really want one, he's so focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them about the water, but they don't seem to care, they're so distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR
